providerAction.name: logicAction
providerAction.description: Gives you the ability to insert code dynamically.

inputFields.name: logicLanguague
inputFields.description: Programming language the expression is written in.

inputFields.name: logicExpression
inputFields.description: This field holds programmatic expressions that will be evaluated at runtime.
inputFields.value: map = [:]file = '/tmp/hadoop.txt'new File(file).eachLine { line ->    def (key,value) = line.tokenize(',')    map['city.' + key] = line}return map

inputFields.name: logicOperation
inputFields.description: Type of operation to perform on the incoming values.

providerAction.name: logicAction
providerAction.description: Gives you the ability to insert code dynamically.

inputFields.name: logicLanguague
inputFields.description: Programming language the expression is written in.

inputFields.name: logicExpression
inputFields.description: This field holds programmatic expressions that will be evaluated at runtime.
inputFields.value: input = [:]first = '{Expression.firstName.3}'.substring(2)input['Expression.firstName.3'] = firstlast = '{Expression.lastName.3}'.substring(2)input['Expression.lastName.3'] = lastcity = '{Expression.city.3}'.substring(2)input['Expression.city.3'] = city

inputFields.name: logicOperation
inputFields.description: Type of operation to perform on the incoming values.

providerAction.name: logicAction
providerAction.description: Gives you the ability to insert code dynamically.

inputFields.name: logicLanguague
inputFields.description: Programming language the expression is written in.

inputFields.name: logicExpression
inputFields.description: This field holds programmatic expressions that will be evaluated at runtime.
inputFields.value: map = [:]file = '/tmp/mysql.txt'new File(file).eachLine { line ->    def (key,value) = line.tokenize(',')    map['lastName.' + key] = line}return map

inputFields.name: logicOperation
inputFields.description: Type of operation to perform on the incoming values.

providerAction.name: logicAction
providerAction.description: Gives you the ability to insert code dynamically.

inputFields.name: logicLanguague
inputFields.description: Programming language the expression is written in.

inputFields.name: logicExpression
inputFields.description: This field holds programmatic expressions that will be evaluated at runtime.
inputFields.value: map = [:]file = '/tmp/oracle.txt'new File(file).eachLine { line ->    def (key,value) = line.tokenize(',')    map['firstName.' + key] = line}return map

inputFields.name: logicOperation
inputFields.description: Type of operation to perform on the incoming values.

providerAction.name: email
providerAction.description: Sends an email to the specified parties

inputFields.name: Password
inputFields.description: Password

inputFields.name: Host
inputFields.description: SMTP Mail host

inputFields.name: Enable SSL
inputFields.description: SSL

inputFields.name: User
inputFields.description: Username

inputFields.name: Port
inputFields.description: Mail host email port

inputFields.name: To
inputFields.description: Comma-separated recipient list

inputFields.name: Message
inputFields.description: Message body
inputFields.value: Details for ID 3 are:First name (from Oracle): ${Expression.firstName.3}Last name (from MySQL): ${Expression.lastName.3}City (from Hadoop): ${Expression.city.3}

inputFields.name: Subject
inputFields.description: Message subject

inputFields.name: AutoPipeAttach
inputFields.description: Attaches any input piped into this action as a .json attachment
